# Needle Treasures Nook

> Cross-stitch patterns inspired by nature. Modern primitive designs handstitched on tea-dyed linen.

## About
Needle Treasures Nook is a cross-stitch pattern shop run by Marieta, a designer with over 30 years of stitching experience. The shop specializes in modern primitive, nature-inspired cross-stitch patterns. All designs are first stitched by hand on linen that Marieta dyes herself using tea, marigolds, and garden flowers.
